mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PetsitterReply WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum} ORDER BY CASE WHEN replyParents = 0 THEN replyNum ELSE replyParents END, replyNum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PetsitterReply(boardNum, replyContent, userID, replyDate, replyGID, replyOrder, replyParents) VALUES(#{boardNum}, #{replyContent}, #{userID}, TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), #{replyGID, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{replyOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{replyParents, jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PetsitterReply WHERE replyNum = #{replyNum} or replyGID = #{replyNum}
